start: ^Oh hey! Can I just get an Americano please?
^I have a big show tonight, and it would be bad if I just start snoozing on my fans.

c-0: ^I'm glad you asked! I do music, it's like a mix between disco pop and funk.
c-1: ^I know you didn't ask, but I make music, it's sort of a mix between disco pop and funk.
g-0: ^I have big hopes and dreams, tonight will definitely be the breakthrough that I've been hoping for.
g-1: ^Oh who am I kidding, it's barely a show. I was hired to be a performer for some kids birthday party.
g-2: ^I've had dreams of making it big, performing in sold out venues, headlining for Coachella. Instead...

^All I've been able to do is sing Cocomelon songs, while dressed as a clown. I could be touching peoples hearts with my melodies, but instead i'm making balloon animals while having infants vomit on me.
^The Jonas Brothers started off as for kids.
g-3: ^Oh sorry, I forgot to introduce myself, I'm Eugene.
